title: What games are you playing now?
body:
I haven't played league in a long while. I feel a lot of people are in the same boat.

What games are you playing? I personally have taken a shining to rogue-likes

The two games I am really enjoying right now are Caves of Qud and Cataclysm DDA. Both have a very unique spin on the genre. How about you guys? Also have any of you played caves of qud or catclsym dda? Just curious
